TextView.tools:text: S.1.1 The Speaking Test Layout Quiz

TextView.android:text: 1. Write the items to arrange the sections in IELTS Listening from top to bottom regarding the speakers in each section.: (1,2,3 or 4)
2) a speech by one speech maker.
3) a group talk between two or three or four people.
4) a lecture presented by a lecturer.
2. Write the correct letter A, B, C, or D next to each section to match the examples to their parts: (1,2,3 or 4)
1) A client calls an insurance company to buy insurance for his car.
2) A tour guide gives information about the facilities in a holiday resort.
3) A discussion among three university graduates about their thesis project.
4) A professor has a seminar about the effects of global warming on seaweed.

TextView.android:text: 4. Watch the video again and fill in the gap.

com.google.android.material.textfield.Te.android:hint: Your answer to fill 1st gap is...
com.google.android.material.textfield.Te.app:helperText: Type your answer inside the box.

TextView.android:text: 5. Write the Speaking priority to their contents: (1,2 or 3)
1) Talk for up to 2 minutes on a written topic without any distractions.
2) Questions about your life or your career or your ideas about certain matters
6. Which option does NOT affect your Speaking mark?

com.google.android.material.radiobutton..android:text: Being able to speak with fluent British or Australian accent.
Being able to analyze issues and justify your reasons and/or opinions
